preview.name: Inlet concentration of A
preview.description: Molar concentration of species A in the feed stream entering the CSTR

preview.name: Concentration of A
preview.description: Steady-state molar concentration of species A within the reactor

preview.name: Concentration of B
preview.description: Steady-state molar concentration of intermediate species B within the reactor

preview.name: Concentration of C
preview.description: Steady-state molar concentration of final product C within the reactor

preview.name: First-order rate constant for A→B
preview.description: Reaction rate constant for the first irreversible first-order reaction converting A to B
Sequential first-order reactions converting A to B and then B to C with rate constants k₁ and k₂.
Definition of the reactor residence time τ as the reactor volume V divided by the volumetric flow rate F.
Rate expression for the first reaction step A → B, following first-order kinetics with respect to A.
Rate expression for the second reaction step B → C, following first-order kinetics with respect to B.
General steady-state material balance for species i in the CSTR, where r_i is its net rate of generation.
